message: Tako kot vsako leto, obveščam člane Slo Techa, ki jih zanimajo vrhunske audio & video naprave, domači kino, zvočniki, ojačevalniki, receiverji, CD ploščki vinilke, gramofoni....vse to bo v začetku oktobra (3-5.10 2014) v Ljubljanskem M Hotelu. Kar nekaj vas je audio navdušencev, ki mi pravite, da o tem niste bili obveščeni, sedaj ste in celo 20 obletnica dogodka je, tako da bo marsikaj za videt in slišat. Vstopnina je 5 EUR.  Več o dogodku: Link  Danes lahko pridete tudi ceneje na HI-FI Show: Link  V tej temi lahko sprašujete tudi tisti, ki na takem sejmu še niste bili.  Have a nice Day  Matt
Še nekaj slik s prejšnjega HI-FI Show-a Link

Prilagam info kaj bo možno videti letos:  ALS audio.video FOCAL, SUGDEN AUDIO, DENSEN AUDIO, Q ACOUSTICS, PRIMARE, THE CHORD CABLE COMPANY, NORTHSTAR DESIGN, CA ELECTRONICS, NUFORCE, MILTY  ARCHUS.SI DLS, DOACOUSTICS, ERZETICH AUDIO, MUSIC HALL, PHONAR, RW ACOUSTICS, SYSTEM AUDIO, ZAPPITI  AUDIO ALTO AUDIO ALTO  AUDIO GALERIJA UNISON RESEARCH, OPERA, ACUSTICA APPLICATA, M2TECH, SILENT WIRE, A.R.T dobre vibracije  CANYON AUDIO ACOUSTIC REVIVE, KUDOS AUDIO, SPEC, OYAIDE, MUSICA, LEBEN, TRIODE  DB AUDIO ACUSTIC ARTS,AYON, DIAPASON  EIS NAIM AUDIO, NEAT ACOUSTICS  ELEKTROAKUSTIKA VICOUSTIC  ESL AUDIO ESL AUDIO, BENCHMARK MEDIA SYSTEMS, ZU AUDIO, ABC PCB, SYNOLOGY  GALLUS AUDIO TECHNOLOGY GALLUS AUDIO , ACUSTIC ARTS, PM ACUSTICS  HAD AUDIOLAB HAD AUDIOLAB  HD MULTIMEDIA PROAC, GRAHAM AUDIO, LAVARDIN, MSB TECHNOLOGY, YBA, GIGAWATT, TARALABS  INTEK NAD, ATC, DYNAUDIO, SHUNYATA RESEARCH, ELECTROCOMPANIET, AUDIOQUEST, GURU ADIO, MUSICAL FIDELITY, CYRUS AUDIO, PRO-JECT  J&B PLOŠČARNA ARC MUSIC, ATAVISTIC, AUM FIDELITY, ALLIGATOR RECORDS, BIG BEAR MUSIC, DELMARK RECORDS, ELECTRO-FI RECORDS, FEDORA RECORDS, HIGHNOTE RECORDS, JUMP RECORDS, LEO RECORDS, PAO RECORDS, PI RECORDINGS, SACKVILLE RECORDS, SAVANT RECORDS, SILKHEART RECORDS, THIRSTY EAR RECORDS, TZADIK  KUZMA KUZMA, CARDAS, BENZ, HIGH FIDELITY, HRT  NATURAL SOUND FM ACOUSTICS, TAOC, DURAND, FABER'S CABLE  NEL AUDIO LEGACY  PRIMALINE TAD TECHNICAL AUDIO DEVICES LABORATORIES INC., ABSOLUE CREATIONS, MUSIC TOOLS  PTS ADVANCE ACOUSTIC, KINGS AUDIOPHILE, ACOUSTAT  ROBERTOSHOP ARTR SOLUTION  RW ACOUSTICS RW ACOUSTICS  SM AUDIODESIGN SM AUDIODESIGN, NAT AUDIO  TRM AUDIO TRM AUDIO  UBIQ AUDIO SONUS FABER, AVANTGARDE ACOUSTIC, MCINTOSH, UBIQ AUDIO, DANIEL HERTZ, SKOGRAND CABLES, ANTIPODES AUDIO  ZVUČNE NOVOSTI ACOUSTIC ENERGY, BLACK RHODIUM  YUGOVINYL
